Metadata: South Central California Oil and Gas Project Newsletter for Fishermen and Offshore Operators (Volume 5, Nos. 1-12, January-â€‹December 1988)
The University of California Sea Grant Marine Advisory Program Cooperative Extension

Topics in these issues include: Local fisheries mitigation funds; Oil and gas projects; Governor supports oil/fisheries mitigation program; Over $500,000 available for low interest, fuel conservation loans; Geophysical survey effects on eggs and larvae; State Lands Commission begins work on a comprehensive offshore resource study; State responds to San Luis Obipo's proposed use of block grant funds; Attention mariners: Now is the time to talk garbage; Proposed draft map on seismic/fishing seasons; Coastweeks '88; Co-industry efforts result in new fisheries impact program; Fisheries updates; Seismic survey, Oil and gas and platform information, and more.
